channel.title: Datasets on MILES | Machine Integration and Learning for Earth Systems

item.title: Earth System Data Science
item.description: Term: 2020 - 2023 Website: https://ncar.github.io/esds/ NCAR’s Earth System Data Science (ESDS) initiative aims to build a community of technical support for geoscientists by addressing common big data challenges.

item.title: Project Raijin
item.description: Term: 2021 - 2024 Funding source: NSF Partners: NCAR/CGD, Penn State University, Colorado State University, Max-Planck-Institut f√ºr Meteorologie Website: https://raijin.ucar.edu/ The goal of this three-year NSF Earth Cube funded effort is to develop open source, Python based tools for the analysis of simulation data sampled on unstructured grids.
